content: materials to knit your own colorful corner blanket you will need… 9 skeins of purl soho s gentle giant 1 100% merino wool each skein is 48 yards/ 125 grams - color a 1 skein approximately 45 yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 45 yards required - color c 1 skein approximately 45 yards required - color d 6 skeins approximately 270 yards required you will also need - us 19 15mm 40-inch circular needles 2 gauge 6 stitches and 12 row = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions 30 inches wide x 42 inches long samples we knit up our samples in two inspiring color palettes note some colors may no longer be available … - wild heather color a cowrie pink color b calico pink color c silver mauve color d heirloom white - fresh fruit color a is super pink color b is parakeet yellow color c is super yellow color d is heirloom white for more color ideas see our original post 3 and our 2017 update 4 1 https //www purlsoho com/gentle-giant html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/2016/12/07/colorful-corner-blanket/ 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2017/11/17/gentle-giant-blankets-in-new-colors/
